description: Bombing Run now available for purchase. 180 mu per use.
M8 and T17 now take 15% less received accuracy while moving and have +5 LOS.
Airborne squads can purchase radios allowing them to capture unconnected territory.
All Airborne may now throw Grenades and Smoke Grenades 50% further, as well as from buildings. Satchels may also be thrown 50% further.
Allows the Hellcat to purchase the Staghound 50.Cal. Ambush bonus now last for a second shot. Lowers turret rotation speed by 20%.
Sherman Crocs can purchase a .50 cal turret MG. Engineer Flamethrowers gain +5 range and +15% damage.
All Airborne now throw a second Satchel Charge after throwing the first.
All Airborne may equip 4 Ranger Garands for free, and may purchase up to 2 M1919A6 LMGs for 80 MU.
Airborne have +15% sight range and health for 90 seconds after a dropping in hostile territory. Assault Airborne Squads now spawn a smoke cloud on drop.
All purely airdropped platoons deploy 50% faster. Includes Airborne support teams.
All Airborne may equip 4 M1A1 Carbines for free. Assault Airborne Thompson upgrade is replaced by M2 Carbines.
Fireup grants heroic charge bonuses instead. Ending the charge in hostile territory delays the exhaustion. Note: Heroic Charge does NOT grant suppression immunity.
Machine Guns, Mortars, and Anti-Tank Guns now have Airborne crews. Mortars and Machine Guns may also use fireup when they have these crews.
Medical Crates now available for purchase. Airdrops a supply crate which quickly heals nearby infantry for a short duration. 55 mu per use.
Recon Run (120mu 8min cd) and Smoke Run (90mu 7 min cd) are now available for purchase.
Strafing Run now available for purchase. 110 mu per use.
Jeeps and M3 Half-tracks (excluding quads) now have Bren Carrier Self-Repair.
All platoons with tanks or vehicles (excluding Jeeps) will arrive on field instantly.
Halftracks gain overdrive and 50% faster turret rotation. Quad .50s gain overdrive and 25% faster turret rotation.
M10s, M18s, M36, and Easy Eights now have +5 sight range.
Mechanized Infantry, Snipers, Jeeps, and Armored Cars gain the Tracking the Tracks ability to use on enemy vehicles, which grants x1.2 received accuracy, penetration, and fog of war detection.
Calliopes can fire an armour piercing barrage. Sherman 105 can fire bunker buster and smoke rounds.
Purchasing the 50 cal machine gun upgrade on vehicles now also increase line of sight by 5.
Shermans and Pershings may fire smoke rounds.
All Sherman variants may now purchase either the Mine flail or Bulldozer. Bulldozers and Mine flails reduce speed by 25% instead of 50%. In addition, Mine fails give 10% more hitpoints.
Increases acceleration, deceleration, and turret rotation on all tanks except the 105 and E8 by 25%.
Quad 50. Cal Halftracks may now use AP Rounds.
All nontank vehicles except jeeps may now capture territory.
All Engineers can now repair 30% faster.
Vehicles and tanks may purchase self repair kits.
Fire-up and Sprint cooldowns reduced by 30 seconds.

internal_name: Here to Clean Up This Mess
description: Rangers are no longer purchased with bazookas. May purchase 2 Bazookas, 4 Thompsons, and/or 2 BARs.
Rifleman can replace their squad leader with a Ranger for 20mp. Those squads also recover from suppression 20% faster.
Medic Tents, Triage Centers, and Machine Gun Nests have 25% more hit points.
Riflemen equipped with BARs receive 0.85 received damage at 5 men, an additional 0.85 received damage at 3 men, and an additional 0.85 damage at 2 men.

Shermans receive +20% reload time, but in return hull/coaxial machine guns receive +25% increased damage, firerate and burst duration, -25% cooldown, and +15 range. Turret MGs receive +5 range, +20% burst duration and firerate, -20% cooldown.
Riflemen and Ambush Riflemen can build Barbed Wire and Sandbags.
Potato Grenade ability is now given to squads who purchase grenades. Throws a fake grenade at target.
57mm Anti-tank Guns AP Rounds replaced with Advanced Anti-tank Gun AP Rounds.  Providing an additional +25% damage and 5 second ability duration.

internal_name: Smoke Will Block Out the Sky
description: Smoke Barrage is available for purchase. 13 Smoke Shells are dropped in the designated area over time. Recharging cooldown, 90 mu.
60mm Mortars now have M83 Flare Rounds. Lights up an area for 15 seconds.
105 Howitzer Barrage is available for purchase. 120 mu per use.
Medic stations now provide 3 medics instead of 2.
Ambush Riflemen, Riflemen, and Engineers may purchase "Snare Mines" which slow enemy infantry.
Coaxial and Hull Machine Guns on Tanks and armored Vehicles gain +33% fire rate, 10% incremental accuracy and 2x search radius. All tank MGs gain +5 range.
Infantry within 25 unit range of tanks receive 25% less damage and 30% less suppression.
Repair bunkers gain a 3rd repair pioneer.
Blitzkrieg available for purchase. Recharging cooldown, 150 mu.
Infantry inside halftracks regenerates at KCH speed. Infantry unloading from halftracks gain +10% accuracy,damage and sprint for 15 seconds.
All Tanks, Half-Tracks, and Armored Cars may now purchase Tank Smoke for 15 Munitions.
Stormtroopers may now purchase Elite Armor instead of weapon upgrades.
Regular Crits for Tiger
Platoons with only Volksgrenadiers or Grenadiers have 75% less deployment timer.
Medpacks no longer slow squads. Walking Wounded move normally in neutral and enemy territory.
After throwing a grenade, units gain sprint and +50% suppression for 3 seconds. Assault also gains +50% suppression.
Assault available for purchase on Volks, Stormtroopers, Grenadiers, and KCH.
Half-tracks now have the Overdrive ability. All Vehicles and Armored Cars gain 15% additional line of sight, maneuverability, and speed.
All Armor moves 20% faster for 15 seconds upon entering the field. All infantry sprint for 15 seconds upon entering the field.
Heavy Mortar Bombardment barrage available for purchase. Lightly saturates an area with mortar shells for 45 seconds. 65 mu per use.
Designate an area in the Fog of War for a flare to fired into. Flare makes a small area in the fog of war visible. Recharging cooldown, 60 mu.
Grenadiers, Volksgrenadiers, Knight Cross Holders, and Pioneers now have +4 sight range.
Officers may now supervise all infantry in an aura around them (+20% accuracy) but are immobile while doing so. Medics can purchase an LMG42 and Officer may also purchase an LMG42 or Panzershreck.
Officers can purchase an upgrade granting Lieutenant aura buffs in exchange for -35% maximum hitpoints on the officer.
Grenadier Rifles may now be purchased for support weapons and Pioneers for 5 Munitions.
Volksgrenadiers and Pioneers may purchase Grenades. Burst length increased by 10% on LMG42s and 25% on Volksgrenadier MP40s.
Medic bunkers create Grenadier Walking Wounded instead of Volksgrenadier Walking Wounded.
Walking Stukas now have Incendiary and Smoke Barrages.
MG42 Teams, and Mortars gain the Sprint ability. Pak38s and Nebelwerfers move faster.
StuGs gain +5% range in friendly territory and benefit from For the Fatherland. Geschützwagens gain +5% range, -15% received damage during rapid fire.
Support weapons have +1 resupply. In addition, all support weapons have 15% more hitpoints on the weapon.
Rocket Artillery barrages are available for purchase. 130 mu.
Registered Artillery available for purchase, deploying defensive artillery barrages on allied bunkers. Recharging cooldown, 90 mu.
All Bunkers gain 30% more health. Garrisoned infantry slowly heal and gain +5% accuracy per minute. Caps at +15%
Under Development [Storm]
Sandbags, Barbed Wire, and Tank Traps build 25% faster and have 50% more health.
For the Fatherland available for purchase, granting powerful defensive bonuses to infantry in friendly territory. Recharging cooldown, 150 mu.
Under development

Volksgrenadiers and Sturmpioneers gain +5% accuracy and -5% received suppression per man lost, +5hp on first casualty, -10% cooldown for every extra loss. Pioneers and Saboteurs take 0.85 received suppression.
Knights Cross Holders and Terror Officers inspire nearby troops to fight better. They are 10% more accurate and receive 10% less damage.
Goliaths gain line of sight.

Hostile Infantry in the target area of Stuka and Nebelwerfer barrages may be slowed before the barrage hits. Nebelwerfer rockets now travel 50% faster, fire 33% faster, and have a 30% larger suppression radius.

internal_name: In the Name of the King
description: Infantry within 30m of the King Tiger gain 20% increased accuracy. The KT can buy a crew repair kit (accelerates repairs, requires extra pios for maximum effect).
Snipers have 50% less setup time and gain 15% cooldown reduction.
Walking Wounded squads return to the field with 2 MP40s and Panzerfausts.
Regular Crits for KT
Pioneers and Sturmpioneers may purchase Volksgrenadier Rifles for free.
Firestorm barrage now unlocked for purchase. 110 mu per use.
Pioneers and Sturmpioneers may now purchase Perfectionism Repairs, which repairs at 0.8 speed and 0.165 wear and tear.
Inspired Assault ability now available for purchase, granting infantry powerful offensive bonuses while making them more vulnerable to incoming fire. Recharging cooldown, 85 mu.
Dev Test: Inspired Assault reduces damage taken by 15% (secondary effect still being tested)
MG42s grant 1.1 received accuracy on the target they are firing on.
Propaganda Towers may now be built by Pioneers for 1 population. Propaganda Towers reduce accuracy by 15% and increase received suppression by 15% on nearby enemy infantry.
Offmap ability which lowers LoS and Stealth Detection of all the squads within a circle for a short time. Recharging cooldown, 50 mu.
Bren Gun Carriers now have an ability which adds +10 sight range and grants +18 stealth detection. SAS Jeeps receive half the bonus.
Concealing Smoke cloaks units 30% longer, but has 25% longer cooldown.
LTs and Captains gain Commando smoke on a 5 minute cooldown.
Lieutenants and Captains may now purchase a PIAT for 50 Munitions, Commando Grenades for 40 Munitions, a Bren Gun for 20 Munitions, or a Boys AT Rifle for free.
PIAT Commandos may purchase a 4th squad member. They may also choose to swap their PIATs for 3 Bren Guns with a 20 MU refund, or 3 Boys AT Rifles and a 60 MU refund.
Gilder CCS is available for deployment.
Pure Commando platoons now deploy 75% faster (including Polish Paras and gliders).
25 Pounder Artillery Barrage (80 mu per use) and Decoy Smoke (5 mu per use) now available for purchase.
Armor and Infantry Gliders are now available for use.
Glider deployment timer reduced by half. Troops fireup for ten seconds after exiting gliders.
Lieutenants and Captains are granted an ability which tracks enemy units in the fog of war.
Radio Triangulation Devices now available for purchase. Can be placed by Sappers and Commandos. 120 mu. [Bugged]
Units within 7.5 unit radius of Radio Disruption offmap ability gain camouflage temporarily for 5 seconds, but weapons are disabled. Applies only to your own units. Recharging cooldown, 100 mu.
Proper Encryption ability now available for purchase. Blurs enemy minimap and tactical map and reduces enemy units' sight by five meters while active. Recharging cooldown, 80 mu.

Emplacement trucks have 50% higher speed, acceleration, and deceleration along with 20% more hitpoints. In addition, 25 Pounders and Bofors now have 35% more hitpoints and gain the Hunker Down ability.
When in proper emplacements, Vickers Machine Gun and 3 Inch Mortars receive Lieutenant buff[BUGGED]. 17 Pounder Nests will provide Captain aura buff to the sector(working)
The AVRE gains a high penetration, low AoE anti-tank shell capable of doing significant damage.
Casualty Clearing Station have 30% less cooldown timer and +10 healing radius.
Captains gain the "Heroic Sit and Shoot" ability which makes all infantry near the captain fight harder while moving slowly.
CCS medics are replaced with active healing medics.
Tank Commanders grant 15% increased experience gain. In addition, Churchills may now purchase the Tank Commander upgrade for 25 Munitions.

internal_name: I Can See for Miiiiles Up Here
description: I Can See For Miles ability is given to all tanks with Tank Commanders. Grants line of sight to a selected area.
Cromwell Command Tanks now grant Lieutenant aura buff to infantry.
Firefly 17pdr's moving accuracy penalty is removed. Cromwell and Churchill 6pdrs' moving accuracy penalty is reduced to 0.75. All Churchills may buy mineplows.
British Armor gains the Hulldown ability, which disables movement but grants 0.75 received penetration and 0.75 received damage.
AVRE turret rotation, acceleration, and max speed increased by 30%. Flame-Stuarts gain +5 range.
Tommies and Sappers grant nearby Tanks -1% received penetration and accuracy per man. Tank Shock grants nearby troops -10% rec. accuracy.

internal_name: Now This is a Big Sodding Gun
description: Sappers may now purchase Rifle Grenades and Bren Guns. (Clearing charges will be available with demos with a coming patch)
Sappers gain Golden Wrenches ability which instantly restores 100 health on tanks.
25 Pounders, Priests, and Supercharged 3 Inch Mortars have 15% less scatter and 15% more accuracy.
Supercharge upgrade available on Mortars, Priests, and 25 Pounders.
Artillery Overwatch is being tested here. It is remarkably difficult to get to work.
[No longer purchaseable. Will be replaced]
Creeping Barrage ability available for purchase. 90 mu per use. Cromwell Command Tanks are also given 1 use of Creeping Smoke Barrage.
Captains and LTs can lockdown to gain +15 LOS.
Casualty Clearing Stations now grant Lieutenant aura buff.
HMG teams, Bofors, and 17 pounders which are stationary for 10 seconds or longer gain 15% more sight, 35% more stealth detection, and 10% more accuracy.
Recon Sections now have +5 weapon range, as well as +10% accuracy (not stacking with LT aura).
Grit and Determination now usable by Tommies and SSF. Ability breaks suppression and reduces weapon cooldown by 50%. Can only be used while garrisoned.
Stuarts and Staghounds now have +5 weapon range on their cannons. Does not stack with the range bonus from command tanks.
Tank Commanders increase accuracy by 10%. Flank Speed increases penetration by 50%.

Self Repair on Bren Carriers and Bren Gun Carriers now have 0.80 speed reduction instead of 0.35 speed reduction. In addition, the cooldown on Self Repair has been reduced by 15%. Repair manuals may be purchased to allow garrisoned combat repairs.

Lockdown ability given to Bren Gun Carrier and Universal carrier which increases accuracy and suppression by 25%. Acceleration and max speed also increased 20%. Infantry in carriers retain 60% of thier reveal radius.
Units inside universal carriers reload 25% faster.
Stuka Terror Dive Offmap available for purchase. Suppresses infantry in an area you select. 45 mu per use.
Butterfly Bombs now available for purchase. 85 mu per use.

internal_name: Taking Notes On The Way Down
description: Airborne units gain additional line of sight while paradropping.
Panzer IV IST and Wirbelwind acceleration, deceleration increased by 30%, and max speed by 20%. the P4IST also gets its turret rotation increased by 30%.
Fallshirmjägers may now purchase AT Rifles, or a single schreck. Fallschirmjägers and Gebirgsjägers can volley off two Panzerfaust uses in rapid succession.
Fast bomber that drops a single bomb with a large area of effect. 75 mu per use. Broken currrently
Luftwaffe Ground Forces may now purchase an LMG42, 2 G43s, or 2 Butterfly Mines. Fallschirmjägers can purchase 2 G43s.
Pak40s, Marders and Scout Cars now cloak after locking down.
Medic Half-Tracks now camouflage when deployed.
Wirbelwinds now have +5 weapon range. Scout Cars with Support Fire upgrade receive +5 weapon range when locked down.
Dev Test: All Tanks receive +15 hp per veterancy level. Wirbelwinds may purchase Contact-Fuse AP rounds.(not buyable atm)
Luftwaffe Ground Forces, Fallshirmjägers and Gebirgsjägers are granted the Sprint ability.
Fallshirmjägers platoon can infiltrate out of buildings.
Flak 88 and Flakvierling Opel Blitz now has Half-track armor. In addition, the Trucks, Flak 88 and Flakvierling have 35% more hitpoints. Flakvierling have improved crews.

Extra use for Incendiary Grenades, AT Grenades, Panzerfausts, Half-track Mines, Smoke Grenades, and Anti-Building Grenades. Fallshirmjägers and Luftwaffe Ground Forces may purchase Incendiary and AT Grenades.
Burning Bombardment Offmap Artillery is unlocked for purchase. 45 mu.
Hummels, Hotchkai with Stuka, and Sturmpanzers may now fire Incendiary Barrages.
Offmap available for purchase that provides all units outside friendly territory -25% damage and infantry units -25% received suppression. Recharging cooldown, 120 mu.
Hummels fire an extra shell on their normal barrage. In addition, Mortar Half-tracks fire two extra shells in its barrage ability.
Panzer IV ISTs' weapon range is increased by five and may purchase Thermite rounds.
Target friendly squads, any of your infantry hit by this ability will gain extreme combat buffs in exchange for a speed reduction for the next 25 seconds.
Suppressive Volley Fire on G43s can be used while garrisoned in buildings and the Slow effect lasts 15% longer.
Forward HQ ability unlocks and allows you to capture an occupied building which heals nearby infantry.On a long cooldown with unlimited uses.
Deployed Vampire Halftracks reduce healing and repair speeds of all enemy units in the sector. Also grants Vampires an MG.
Incendiary Grenades now burn 5 seconds longer. Ostfront grenadiers can now purchase molotov uses.
Two Incendiary Grenades are now thrown with every use.

Unlocks the ability to purchase the Overextended Offensive utility offmap. Select an Allied sector, and after a short period, all enemy units in the sector receive severe combat penalties and -1 to move speed.
All infantry may now purchase building and ground Booby Traps.
Panzer Grenadiers gain access to improved sprint, with an increased duration and reduced cooldown
Designates Sector for auto-targeting incendiary Artillery. TESTING: Currently non-functional until further notice.
Scorched Earth ability available for use. Disables one neutral or friendly sector for three minutes and reduces the benefits of cover.
Whenever you control less than half of the sectors, and lose a sector, your total pop increase by 1 (to a maximum of 40)
All Infantry may now build Roadblocks and Wire.
All Panzergrenadier variants may now purchase Panzerfausts.
Light AT Half-Tracks' weapon range increased by five and Treadbreaker cooldown reduced by one third. Hetzers can now rotate while cloaked, have faster tracking speed, and do extra ambush damage.
This ability has been moved.
Vampire Half-tracks are now granted Tank Awareness and 15% increased sight range.
All infantry now have Tank Awareness.
Locked down units get +5 Line of sight, and +1 range on primary weapons every 4 seconds, up to +10%." (known issue: MG car currently still limited to +3).
Marders, Hetzers, ATHTs, and Panthers may purchase the APCR rounds upgrade.

Infantry inside Infantry Half-Tracks are 15% more accurate. Panzer Grenadier may now purchase MP40s. Scout Cars, Armored Cars, Infantry Half-tracks, Mortar Half-tracks, and Light AT Half-tracks may now purchase improved armor.
Infantry Halftrack MGs gain +20% burst duration and tracking speed, Mortar Halftrack gains +5 range and the Vampire Halftrack gains +250HP.
Vehicles in cover receive 10% less damage, and suffer 66% less movement penalty. All light vehicles now have medium terrain crush (not people!)
Bergetiger can now lock down and spawn 2 expert repair pioneers à la the Repair Bunker.
Tank Busters may now purchase a second Panzerschreck. In addition, AT Grenades now throw a second grenade after the first.
Walking Wounded have Advanced Repairs. Bergetigers repair wrecks 50% faster.

Marders, Light AT Half-tracks, Hetzers, Nashorns, and Jagdpanthers gain 20% increased acceleration and deceleration. In addition, the Marder and Nashorn can now exit its Sight Main Gun ability 50% faster.
Marders, Light AT Half-Tracks, Hotchkai, Nashhorns, Jagdpanthers and others may purchase the Spotting Scope upgrade for +10 sight range.
